title: Register to Vote
description: Register to vote in California or confirm your registration status! All voters must be registered by October 21st.

title: Receive Ballot
description: California residents will start to receive their vote-by-mail ballots on October 7th!

title: Turn in Ballot
description: Voters can return their ballots by mail, at a drop-off location, or at the county elections office starting on October 8th! All ballots must be sent back on or before Election Day.

title: All Ballots Received
description: All ballots must be received by November 12th for their votes to count!
